Okay, I had the same problem the rest of you had with the error message.  This is how you fix it.

I ran the set up file.  It would get to about 70% complete, give the error message and close.  I updated everything, ran all the files, restarted, closed daemon tools, etc etc etc, nothing worked.  So i looked at the installer before closing it.  It said C:/Users/(account name, for me, Bjjorick)/APPData/Local/Temp/redist/xxx.xxx.

The xxx is any number of files it was looking for. This torrent included a redist file with it, so i mve it to  C:/Users/Bjjorick/APPData/Local/Temp/ and then ran the setup.  It ran just fine.  

Just take the redist file that came with this torrent, move it there, problem should be fixed.

I hope this helps someone.

If you don't trust the setup.exe, just remove it with your virus scanner and install the game trough opening the FortZombieSetup.msi in the redist folder.
Works 100% fine on that way. You don't need to use the setup.exe

More info about "virus" (created by avast internet security)

File name: setup.exe
Original folder: C:Users%accountname%downloadsfort zombiefortzombie 1.07
File size: 346185
Category: Infected
Description of virus: NSIS:Fasec-CD [Drp]

(It's not because your virus scanner warns you it means that it is a virus, most cracked games uses codes that have the behavior of a specific virus but it isn't

This game seems like a real MUTHER fucker to get for some reason - usually means it fukking blows. I ONLY want the game because my zombie game crazed nephew. the character in the game looks JUST LIKE HIM!!! HAHAHA - so i have to fucking have it. (he even named his cat Romero after George Romero)

OK - HERE ARE THE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

Borrowing some of Bjjorick's method, I have figure out how to install this muther fukker.

1] Go to C:/Users/*USER NAME*/APPData/Local/Temp/ and then ran the setup as Administrator. It will unpack some needed files - then you get the error. Click OK and close the installer.

2] Copy ALL the files from the 'redist' folder to the above mentioned folder (C:/Users/*USER NAME*/APPData/Local/Temp/)

3] In the Temp folder (C:/Users/*USER NAME*/APPData/Local/Temp/) double click the 'FortZombieSetup.msi' file to begin installation.

I am running this game on Windows 7 Ultimate x64 in full screen 1920x1080

Works perfect.

There is NO viruses in ANY of the installation packages whatsoever. I am running ESET v5 and ripped EVERYTHING apart using 7-Zip.

Thanks FuctUpPunk. I finally have a copy of this game.

PEACE!!!

-Majestic One
